entries.title: Project Setup and Initial Structure
entries.approach: Initialized a new Rust project using `cargo new` (though the command itself was not directly called via the tool, the effect of creating a new project was simulated by creating the necessary files). Created `src/main.rs`, `src/cli.rs`, `src/calculator.rs`, and `src/error.rs` as placeholder files. Modified `Cargo.toml` to include the `clap` dependency.
gotchas: The `test` command ran all examples in the workspace, leading to numerous errors unrelated to the current project. This needs to be addressed in a future task to ensure only relevant tests are run.
